title: Yuusha Ni Narenakatta Ore Wa Isekai De - Novel Updates
tags: Cheats   Demon Lord   Depictions of Cruelty   Fantasy World   Male Protagonist   Multiple Transported Individuals   R-15   Transported to Another World
author: Kurata Furato   倉田フラト
description: An entire high school class is summoned to a different world.  Everyone except for one boy, Sora, becomes a Hero.  Unable to become a Hero, he is forsaken by the queen and banished into the void in a half dead state.  Then, just before his life can run, the Demon King rescues him.  The young man, having had his life saved by the Demon King, dedicates the rest of his life for revenge.>
